sentence.Network_en: Beauty is the least of her perfections.
sentence.Network_cn: 美貌是她优点中最微不足道的.

sentence.Network_en: I'm terrified of all these perfections.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对这种完美无缺感到惊恐.

sentence.Network_en: He has some perfections in her eye which can make up that deficiency.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在他身上看到某些优点,足以弥补这方面的缺陷.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Beauty is the least of her perfections ., 美貌是她优点中最微不足道的.
